fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Ink a player during the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Inked players will target players randomly until visited at least once.
- Inked players will not know who their random targets are, but they will know they were inked.
- Inking pierces redirect immunity.
- If you are attacked and survive, you will Ink the attacker.
